author: kevinrQ6663JH
title: Good hotel for visiting London near Euston Station
text: It was very good value. The staff were welcoming and helpful right from check in all the way till we left, they even provided a facility for minding your bags securely after you checked out until your train was due to depart. It was only a few minutes walk from the station, so no need for a taxi! Clean, warm, good breakfast and friendly helpful staff - what more could you ask for! We will return.
